title: Delete product instance
content:
This page explains how to delete a product instance record..

Prerequisite

If the product instance is in the "In use" or "Expiring" phase, change it to the "Inactive" phase before deleting it. For the procedure to change the phase of a product instance, see the "Change phase of product instance" section in Product instance workflow.

Delete product instance

  1. Click > Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Product Instances.
  3. Select the product instance you want to delete.
  4. Click Delete.
  5. Click OK in the Confirm Delete dialog box.
